creator: Innovastra Limited
descriptionHtml:
OneCare is a world ultra-modern electronic health care systems with integrated electronic health records, telemedicine, practice management and revenue cycle management. OneCare offers a fully integrated suite of Health IT products empowering the transformation of healthcare systems.

OneCare provides a more holistic and longitudinal health records.

OneCare Offers complete digital patient Records through connected healthcare systems. Intuitive clinical workflows that make healthcare easier. A fully integrated single shared Electronic Health Records, available in real-time, and for all levels of healthcare from primary care to tertiary care, maternity care, and specialist care.

With OneCare, healthcare providers can steer patient gratification and quality of care improvements from anywhere in the world. It can be used for self, family and friends. Patients can easily book appointments with doctors from different hospital at their convenient and pay for the services required from their providers. Typically, EHR has a patient portal that can be used by patients to access their own health records. It also offers easy communication with the clinicians.

Scheduling

OneCare provides an appointment scheduling functionality where you can schedule e-visits with the Doctor of your choosing at a specified start and end time as well as various other actions such as editing or deleting your schedules.

Lab & Radiology Reports

This module shows all the lab & radiology done from your provider. Lab reports are an essential part of any eHealth systems. The reports are summarized findings done by the lab and radiology technician which are uploaded to the patient profile. Only the patient can see their own results except when they have given delegated access to a third party. The radiology reports are generated in DICOM images.

ePrescription

When a doctor prescribes drugs to a patient, the patient can go to the pharmacy to pick up their medicine or get it delivered to them. This method minimizes the overburdened practice, stress and the need for manual form prescription.

E-visit (Telemedicine)

This provides an e-functions for your scheduled appointments where you can view the details about the appointment such as Provider name, start time, end time, appointment type and take certain e-actions such as video calls, voice calls and so on. You also get to view the terms and services and accept if in accordance. 

Maternity Care

OneCare maternity care is predetermined to prolong and increase access to care by developing, strengthening the system that helps provide care for the pregnant women. OneCare facilitate consultation and transfer of care when appropriate so that low to moderate-risk women can stay in their communities while pregnant women who are in high-risked conditions receive care in their respective provider who are prepared to provide the required level of specialized care.

Health Summary

An information bank that displays your vitals history, SOAP Notes, history of Conditions, Medications, Allergies, Immunization history and other necessary medical information as pertaining to you.
